balika sama shuratha mathale shri sanghamiththa balika jathika pasala ha nawala janadhipathi balika widuhalata himi wiya.mema tharagawaliya pasugiyada mathale edwad hoki kridanganaya, barnad aluwihare kridanganaya saha nandimithra eekanayaka anthar jathika kruthrima hoki kridanganayedi pawathwini.tharagawaliye dakshathama kridakaya lesa mathale sahira jathika pasale asir ahamad saha dakshathama kridikawa lesa mathale sanghamiththa balika jathika pasale nawanjana eekanayaka sammana labu athara tharagawaliye dakshathama dal rakinna lesa kolambaa di.es.senanayaka widuhale madhushanka wimalawira saha dakshathama dal rakinniya lesa nawala janadhipathi balika widuhale chammi wasana sammana labuha.
